channel.title: Before the Construction skill, what was the Construct Map Region packet for?
channel.description: What was it used for before Construction was implemented?

item.title: Before the Construction skill, what was the Construct Map Region packet for?
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

instanced minigames and cutscenes (ie. demon slayer cutscene uses it when you need to fight delrith)

Read full topic
item.source: Before the Construction skill, what was the Construct Map Region packet for?

item.title: Before the Construction skill, what was the Construct Map Region packet for?
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

I wonder if jagex used the construct map region packet for jad fight caves or if they did use height*4 my guess would be the packet (they must have made it for a reason at the time)

Read full topic
item.source: Before the Construction skill, what was the Construct Map Region packet for?

item.title: Before the Construction skill, what was the Construct Map Region packet for?
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:4, topic:546938”][quote author=Ambokile link=topic=665835.msg4451285#msg4451285 date=1411583282]

Instanced minigames, pmod room (was that before construction?)

What kind of minigames?
[/quote]afaik the ‘common’ example I read about was the fight pits, but it could be that way for any instanced minigame (pc, barb assault)

Then again we can’t really go back and time and see how they did it. and we all know that if you do it right you can just use the height*4 trick to get new instances[/quote]

Could we not look at the osrs client and see how it works on there? Read the appearance updating and the construct map region data

Read full topic
item.source: Before the Construction skill, what was the Construct Map Region packet for?

item.title: Before the Construction skill, what was the Construct Map Region packet for?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Ambokile, post:3, topic:546938”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=665835.msg4451284#msg4451284 date=1411582500]
Instanced minigames, pmod room (was that before construction?)
[/quote]

What kind of minigames?[/quote]afaik the ‘common’ example I read about was the fight pits, but it could be that way for any instanced minigame (pc, barb assault)

Then again we can’t really go back and time and see how they did it. and we all know that if you do it right you can just use the height*4 trick to get new instances
